planet</h2><p>When we say Loom &amp; Leaf is an ultra-premium memory foam mattress, we don’t just stop at luxurious craftsmanship and comfort. class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Every Saatva mattress is made to order and handcrafted in America with care and pride, using only the highest We believe it's the right thing to do for our customers, our American workers, and our economy.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-2" aria-controls="accordion-content-2"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Eco-friendly materials</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-2" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Every Loom &amp; Leaf ultra-premium memory foam mattress features: </p><ul class="specs__list"><li>Cover made with organic cotton</li><li>Guardin™ nontoxic, botanical antimicrobial treatment</li><li>Eco-friendly foams that meet the CertiPUR-US® standards for health and environmental safety</li><li>Flame retardant barrier made from natural thistle pulp (rather than chemical sprays)</li></ul></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-3" aria-controls="accordion-content-3"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Delivery &amp; setup</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-3" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Sit back and relax while we do all the work. Our free white glove delivery includes in-room delivery and set up. We'll even take away your old mattress at no additional cost to you. Just select free mattress removal at checkout.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-4" aria-controls="accordion-content-4"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">365-night home trial</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-4" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">At Saatva, we never pressure you to make up your mind quickly. All of our mattresses come with a 365-night home trial, so you have plenty of time to decide whether it’s right for you. If at any point during your home trial you’re not satisfied, just give us a call and we’ll come pick up the mattress and refund your money, less a $99 processing fee to cover our cost of gas and labor for the pickup. That’s it.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-5" aria-controls="accordion-content-5"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Weight limit</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-5" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Loom &amp; Leaf is best suited for sleepers who weigh 300 pounds and under to ensure the longest-lasting comfort and support.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">If you and/or your sleep partner weigh up to 300 pounds and prefer a more supportive mattress, we'd suggest either our <a href="/mattresses/saatva-classic" target="_self" class="t-link">Saatva Classic</a>, <a href="/mattresses/saatva-classic" target="_self" class="t-link">Saatva Latex Hybrid</a>, <a href="/mattresses/zenhaven" target="_self" class="t-link">Zenhaven</a>, or <a href="/mattresses/solaire" target="_self" class="t-link">Solaire</a>. </p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Those weighing more than 300 pounds would sleep better on a heavy duty hybrid like our <a href="https://www.saatva.com/mattresses/saatva-hd" target="_blank" class="t-link">Saatva HD</a> or an all-latex mattress like our dual-sided <a href="https://www.saatva.com/mattresses/zenhaven" target="_blank" class="t-link">Zenhaven latex mattress</a>.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-6" aria-controls="accordion-content-6"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Mattress weights by size</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-6" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Loom &amp; Leaf:<br>
                Twin: 61 lbs<br>
                Twin XL: 70 lbs<br>
                Full: 79 lbs<br>
                Queen: 93 lbs<br>
                King and Cal king: 116 lbs</p></div></div></div></li></ul><button role="button" type="button" aria-label="show more items" aria-controls="accordion-set" aria-expanded="false" class="show-more-button-module__showMoreButton-bf0 show-more-button-module__showMoreButton--round-8c6"><span class="show-more-button-module__showMoreButton__plus-dd2">+</span></button></div></div></section><section class="specsOrFaqs__faq u-hidden animated-exit-done"><div class="container"><div data-testid="accordionSet" class="accordion-set-module__set-496 faqs containerCol--lg-8 containerCol--md-10 specsFaqsAccordion u-marginTop--md"><ul aria-label="Accordion List" id="accordion-set"><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-bed-in-box" aria-controls="accordion-content-bed-in-box"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Why aren’t your memory foam mattresses shipped in a box like other "bed in a box" mattress brands? </span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-bed-in-box" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="bed-in-box" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Bed in a box (BIAB) mattresses are compressed, shrink-wrapped, folded, then rolled into a cardboard box for shipping. While this allows BIAB companies to save on freight costs, it takes a severe toll on the integrity of the foam mattress by breaking down the cell structure of the foams. It can also result in uneven firmness and sinking support in some areas, reducing the overall lifespan of the mattress.</p><p id="bed-in-box" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We believe your bed deserves better than being stuffed in a box. That’s why all Saatva mattresses, including our Loom &amp; Leaf Memory Foam Mattress, come with FREE white glove delivery and in-home set up. We even take away your old mattress for free! </p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-made-of" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-made-of"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is memory foam made of?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-made-of" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-made-of" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Memory foam, also known as viscoelastic foam, is a type of high-density polyurethane foam. Its distinguishing feature is that it softens in response to heat and pressure. That’s what gives memory foam mattresses their body-hugging, body-contouring feel.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-last" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-last"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">How long do memory foam mattresses last? </span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-last" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-last" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">The durability of a foam mattress can vary greatly depending on the quality and density of the foams. A premium, high-quality memory foam mattress should last you anywhere from 10 to 15 years.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-hot" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-hot"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Are memory foam mattresses hot? </span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-hot" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-hot" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Traditional foam mattresses have a tendency to trap body heat, but new technologies like gel-infused memory foams have come a long way in helping you sleep cooler. Saatva memory foam mattresses also feature covers made naturally breathable organic cotton.</p><p id="foam-hot" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">If you tend to sleep hot, placing your memory foam mattress on a box spring or a platform with open slats will help increase overall airflow. It’s also a great idea to top off your mattress with <a href="/bedding/percale-sheet-set" target="_self" class="t-link">breathable sheets</a> made from natural fabrics to create a cooler, more comfortable sleep environment all around.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-back" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-back"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Are memory foam mattresses good for my back?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-back" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-back" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Yes. Memory foam mattresses conform to your body, helping to keep your spine in a healthy, neutral alignment in any sleep position.</p><p id="foam-back" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Consider your preferred sleeping position when shopping for a foam mattress. If you’re a side sleeper, a softer foam mattress may help reduce pressure on your shoulders and hips. If you sleep on your back or stomach, a medium-firm comfort level or firmer will prevent you from sinking too deeply into the mattress.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-safe" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-safe"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Are memory foam mattresses safe? </span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-safe" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-safe" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We only use nontoxic CertiPUR-US® certified foams in our mattresses. This means that the foams are made without CFCs and other ozone depleters. They also don’t use PBDEs, TDCPP, or TCEP ("Tris"), which are flame retardants that have been identified by the Globally Harmonized System (GHS) as substances that may cause cancer, genetic defects, or damage fertility.</p><p id="foam-safe" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">CertiPUR-US® compliant foams are free of phthalates, formaldehyde, and mercury, lead, or other heavy metals. They're also tested to verify low VOC (volatile organic compound) emissions, so your mattress won’t off-gas in your home.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-gel-foam" aria-controls="accordion-content-gel-foam"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is gel memory foam?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-gel-foam" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="gel-foam" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">This type of memory foam is infused with a cooling gel to help to draw heat away from the body so you sleep cooler.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-loom-clean-foam-mattress" aria-controls="accordion-content-loom-clean-foam-mattress"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">How do I clean a memory foam mattress?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-loom-clean-foam-mattress" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="loom-clean-foam-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">To make sure your mattress looks, feels, and smells its best, run your vacuum upholstery attachment through it at least a couple of times a year to get rid of dust, crumbs, dust mites, and other debris. To spot clean stains off your mattress, be sure to act quickly. Regardless of the type of stain, always check the care label on the mattress before cleanup.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-contain-fiberglass-sock" aria-controls="accordion-content-contain-fiberglass-sock"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Do Saatva mattresses contain fiberglass or a fiberglass sock?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-contain-fiberglass-sock" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="contain-fiberglass-sock" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">No. We never use fiberglass or toxic chemical flame retardants/barriers in any of our mattresses. Instead, we use either a plant-based flame barrier made of thistle pulp, a Paladin flame barrier made with a blend of poly &amp; rayon fibers, or organic New Zealand wool in our mattresses to meet federal safety standards.</p><p id="contain-fiberglass-sock" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">See Specifications under "Eco-friendly materials" for more details.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-gassing" aria-controls="accordion-content-gassing"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is off gassing?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-gassing" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="gassing" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Off gassing is the term for what happens when volatile organic compounds (VOCs) leak out of upholstery materials and mattress foams and into the air you breathe.</p><p id="gassing" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Some people refer to this as a "new mattress smell" that can range from unpleasant to downright nauseating.</p><p id="gassing" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Learn more on our <a href="https://www.saatva.com/blog/what-is-mattress-off-gassing/" target="_blank" class="t-link">blog</a> about off gassing and how Saatva mattresses cut down or completely eliminate this common issue.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-flipOverMattressRegularly" aria-controls="accordion-content-flipOverMattressRegularly"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Do I need to flip over or rotate my mattress regularly?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-flipOverMattressRegularly" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="flipOverMattressRegularly" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our Zenhaven, Latex Hybrid, and Solaire mattresses do not need to be rotated from head to foot. This is due to the 5-zone alignment of the latex layer.</p><p id="flipOverMattressRegularly" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our other mattresses can be rotated. We recommend rotating the mattress after six months and then once a year after that. This will ensure that the surface of the mattress breaks in evenly.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-cleanMyMattress" aria-controls="accordion-content-cleanMyMattress"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">How do I clean my mattress?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-cleanMyMattress" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="cleanMyMattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">As part of regular maintenance, vacuum your mattress at least twice a year to get rid of dust, crumbs, and other icky things that might be living in there. You can also deodorize your mattress by generously sprinkling it with baking soda. Leave it on for a full day and then vacuum it up to refresh your mattress.</p><p id="cleanMyMattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description"><span class="t-fontWeight--normal">Tip:</span> Adding a <a href="https://www.saatva.com/bedding/organic-mattress-pad" target="_blank" class="t-link">mattress pad</a> over your mattress gives it an added layer of protection from stains, moisture, and debris. Just make sure to wash your mattress pad regularly.</p><p id="cleanMyMattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">For more mattress care tips, check out our <a href="https://www.saatva.com/blog/luxury-mattress-care-tips/" target="_blank" class="t-link">blog</a>.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-whichIsBestBackPain" aria-controls="accordion-content-whichIsBestBackPain"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is the best mattress for back pain?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-whichIsBestBackPain" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="whichIsBestBackPain" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Picking the right mattress to help ease back pain starts with assessing your typical sleep position,  then choosing a mattress that best supports you in that position. No matter what kind of mattress you choose, <a href="https://www.saatva.com/blog/best-mattress-for-back-pain/" target="_self" class="t-link">the best mattresses for back pain</a> should include firmer support zones for optimal spinal alignment.

        Every Saatva mattress is engineered with a dedicated lumbar zone support layer to promote healthy spinal alignment for every type of sleeper.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-foam-box-spring" aria-controls="accordion-content-foam-box-spring"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Does a memory foam mattress need a box spring or foundation?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-foam-box-spring" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="foam-box-spring" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">You don’t need a box spring or foundation if you have a platform bed. Otherwise, if your existing foundation or bed support system is over 7 years old or is sagging or damaged in any way, we suggest getting a high-quality <a href="/bases/foundation" target="_self" class="t-link">Saatva foundation</a> to get the most out of your new mattress. Your mattress warranty remains in place even when you use your own existing foundation or box spring.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-14" aria-controls="accordion-content-14"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Will my Saatva mattress work with my existing box spring or foundation?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-14" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><div class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">You can use your existing box spring or foundation if:
            <ul class="faqs__list"><li class="faqs__listItem">You purchased your box spring or foundation within the last 7 years.</li>
            <li class="faqs__listItem">Your existing box spring or foundation is in good condition and provides sturdy center support.</li>
            <li class="faqs__listItem">You don't mind not having a matching foundation.</li></ul>
            <span class="u-paddingBottom--sm u-displayBlock t-italic t-disclaimer">NOTE: <a href="/mattresses/saatva-hd" target="_blank" class="t-link">Saatva HD</a> requires pairing with the HD Foundation for adequate support.</span>
            Saatva mattresses also work with <a href="/furniture?types=platform+bed+frames" target="_blank" class="t-link">platform beds</a>, without the need for a foundation. Please make sure your existing platform bed has:
            <ul class="faqs__list"><li class="faqs__listItem"><span class="t-bold">A solid, durable surface.</span> If your platform has a slatted support system, make sure the slats are spaced less than 4" apart. If they're not, you can add a 1/2" thick piece of plywood to place on top. This extra layer of support is needed because Saatva mattresses are heavier due to their premium quality materials.</li>
            <li class="faqs__listItem"><span class="t-bold">A proper center support.</span> This means you must have a center leg in the middle of your platform bed frame.</li></ul>
            <span class="u-paddingBottom--sm u-displayBlock t-italic t-disclaimer">NOTE: Must add a solid surface over platform slats such as plywood, masonite board, or bunkie board, when used with the dual-sided Zenhaven latex mattress.</span>
            If you have any questions, you can reach one of our sleep guides 24/7 at <a href="tel:18776722882" target="_self" class="t-link">1-877-672-2882</a>.</div></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-15" aria-controls="accordion-content-15"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What bed frames are Saatva mattresses compatible with?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-15" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Saatva mattresses are compatible with any bed frame, including our Saatva bed frames.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our dual-sided Zenhaven latex mattresses cannot be placed directly on a platform bed frame with slats. You must cover the slats with a solid material, such as plywood or a <a href="/blog/bunkie-board/" target="_blank" class="t-link">bunkie board</a>.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Non-platform (standard) bed frames require a foundation and can be paired with any mattress. Note that Saatva HD requires pairing with the HD foundation, which is specifically designed to give it optimal support.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-compatible-with-murphy-beds" aria-controls="accordion-content-compatible-with-murphy-beds"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Are Saatva mattresses compatible with murphy beds?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-compatible-with-murphy-beds" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="compatible-with-murphy-beds" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">The best option for a murphy bed is a foam mattress, either memory foam or latex foam, as they retain their shape better than innerspring mattresses when stored vertically. Additionally, most murphy beds have a maximum mattress height you can use.</p><p id="compatible-with-murphy-beds" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our Loom &amp; Leaf memory foam mattress or Zenhaven all-latex foam mattress are both suitable options to use in a murphy bed, provided the bed frame is compatible with the height/thickness of the mattress. It's very important to check with the manufacturer of your murphy bed frame to see the maximum allowed mattress heigh/thickness before purchasing a mattress for it.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-certipur" aria-controls="accordion-content-certipur"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is CertiPUR-US®?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-certipur" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="certipur" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Foams that are CertiPUR-US® certified are guaranteed to be low in volatile organic compounds (VOCs), so you don’t have to worry about off-gassing odors. CertiPUR-US certified foams are also guaranteed to be free of ozone depleters, PBDEs, TDCPP, and TCEP flame retardants, mercury, lead, and other heavy metals, formaldehyde, and phthalates.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-guardin" aria-controls="accordion-content-guardin"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What's in your exclusive Guardin™ antimicrobial treatment?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-guardin" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="guardin" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our exclusive antimicrobial treatment by Guardin™ is made with a proprietary blend of all-natural essential oils and minerals. This blend includes thyme, geranium, lemongrass, and mint, but is completely odorless and colorless.</p><p id="guardin" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Added to Saatva’s mattress ticking during the manufacturing process and engineered to last the life of the mattress, Guardin™ naturally inhibits the growth of bacteria, mold, mildew, and the discoloration that they can cause on the surface of a mattress. Guardin™ antimicrobial treatment is biodegradable and does not contain any fluorocarbons, toxic heavy metals, silver nanotechnology, triclosan, formaldehyde or phthalates.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-extend-benefits" aria-controls="accordion-content-extend-benefits"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What are the benefits of the Extend protection plan?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-extend-benefits" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="extend-benefits" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">The Extend protection plan provides peace of mind and financial protection for your mattress investment from accidental damage.</p><p id="extend-benefits" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">This plan covers accidental stains and damage NOT covered by the Saatva <a href="https://www.saatva.com/warranty/saatva-mattress-lifetime-warranty/" target="_blank" class="t-link">mattress warranty</a>, such as rips, tears and stains. This plan does not cover theft or damage caused by abuse or misuse.</p><p id="extend-benefits" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Plans are effective from the day your mattress is delivered.</p><p id="extend-benefits" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">For more info &amp; FAQs about Extend accident protection, check out our <a href="/extend" target="_self" class="t-link">Extend page</a>.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-try-mattress-in-store" aria-controls="accordion-content-try-mattress-in-store"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Can I try your mattresses in person?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-try-mattress-in-store" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="try-mattress-in-store" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Yes! <span class="t-fontWeight--normal"><a href="https://locations.saatva.com/" target="_blank" class="t-link">Our Saatva Viewing Rooms</a></span> are inviting, pressure-free spaces to experience Saatva comfort in real life.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-white-glove-delivery" aria-controls="accordion-content-white-glove-delivery"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What is white glove delivery?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-white-glove-delivery" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">White glove delivery is the Saatva service standard and comes free with every mattress, bedroom furniture and rug order. While our teams don't actually wear white gloves, we do all the work for you.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We hand-deliver your mattress and set it up in the room of your choice. We also take away your old mattress and foundation* if you select the "free mattress &amp; foundation removal" at checkout—all at no extra charge!</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Typically, mattress orders are delivered from our factories within a 9-21 day time frame, depending on your zip code.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our bedroom furniture is also hand-delivered and assembled (if applicable) and bedroom rugs are delivered and set up in the room of your choice (rug area must be cleared of furniture by customer prior to delivery). You get all this for free as part of our premium white glove delivery service.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">*Note that there are a few items our delivery teams won't take away the following items:</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description u-marginBottom--none"></p><p class="t-fontWeight--normal u-marginBottom--none"></p><ul class="faqs__list"><li class="faqs__listItem">Waterbed bases</li><li class="faqs__listItem">Standard metal bed frames</li><li class="faqs__listItem">Sleep Number bases</li><li class="faqs__listItem">Stained and/or damaged mattresses &amp; foundations/box springs</li></ul><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description"></p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-return-mattress" aria-controls="accordion-content-return-mattress"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What if I need to return my mattress?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-return-mattress" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="return-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">If you aren't completely happy with your Saatva mattress during your 365-night home trial, just give us a call at <a href="tel:18776722882" target="_self" class="t-link">1-877-672-2882</a>. We’ll schedule a pick up of your mattress and issue a refund for the purchase price (taxes included) to your original method of payment.</p><p id="return-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">You’ll only pay a $99 processing fee and we’ll take care of the rest!<br>We never resell returned mattresses. Instead, we donate them to veterans' shelters or offer them to employees and associates across our network of more than 150 delivery centers.</p><p id="return-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Our Crib Mattress is an exception with a 45-day free return.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-exchange-mattress" aria-controls="accordion-content-exchange-mattress"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What if I need to exchange my mattress?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-exchange-mattress" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="exchange-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">If you decide to exchange your mattress for another Saatva mattress during your 365-night home trial, just give us a call at <a href="tel:18776722882" target="_self" class="t-link">1-877-672-2882</a>. We’ll schedule a pick up of your mattress and start the exchange process.<br>You’ll only pay a $99 processing fee for your replacement delivery and mattress pickup, and we’ll take care of the rest!</p><p id="exchange-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We never resell exchanged mattresses. Instead, we donate them to veterans' shelters or offer them to employees and associates across our network of more than 150 delivery centers.
            Once your new mattress is delivered, a new 365-night home trial begins.</p><p id="exchange-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We’ve learned that the most common reason people exchange is for a different mattress size or height, so be sure to measure the height of your bed frame, adjustable base, and/or foundation/box spring before ordering. You can also call one of our friendly sleep guides for assistance 24/7.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-expedite-delivery" aria-controls="accordion-content-expedite-delivery"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Can I expedite the delivery of my mattress?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-expedite-delivery" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="expedite-delivery" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Every Saatva mattress is made to order, which means they don't sit in storage.</p><p id="expedite-delivery" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Occasionally, we can shorten the delivery time when we have a change or cancellation from another order of the exact same product. This allows us to redirect that freshly made and sealed mattress to you. We’d love to help in any way if you need your mattress faster. Our friendly sleep guides are here for you 24/7 at <a href="tel:18776722882" target="_self" class="t-link">1-877-672-2882</a>.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-25" aria-controls="accordion-content-25"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What do I do if I think my mattress feels too firm when I receive it?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-25" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">All of our mattresses are made to order and arrive to you factory fresh. That means the high-quality materials inside them need a little bit of time to soften up. You should notice your new mattress begin to conform to your body after a few days. You may even notice continuing improvement for up to a month.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Remember that your body will need some time to <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-aaTonZAj9Q" target="_blank" class="t-link">adjust to a brand new mattress.</a> If you've been sleeping on an old mattress, your body likely got used to it, even if it didn't provide you with adequate support. That's why we give you a generous 365-night home trial to give you time to acclimate to your new mattress.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">If after a month or so, you still feel that your mattress is too firm (or too soft), give us a call at <a href="tel:18776722882" target="_self" class="t-link">1-877-672-2882</a> and one of our friendly sleep guides will be happy to help you.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-mattress-sale" aria-controls="accordion-content-mattress-sale"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Does Saatva offer any discounts to first responders, veterans, active military &amp; more?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-mattress-sale" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We offer a year-round $225 discount off orders of $1,000 or more to active military, veterans, first responders, government employees, nurses, teachers, senior citizens &amp; students. To apply the discount, simply click on the "Discount for first responders &amp; more" box at checkout. You will be prompted to register with ID.me to verify your status and receive the discount. Note that your cart will automatically apply the larger discount if there is a promotional sale on Saatva.com that is better than your ID.me discount.</p><p class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">We also occasionally offer promotional sales for limited time periods on our products on Saatva.com and Saatva Viewing Rooms. To be one of the first to learn about our latest sales, sign up for our mailing list at our site footer or text BED to SAATVA (722882). You can unsubscribe at any time.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-commission" aria-controls="accordion-content-commission"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">Are your phone and store representatives on commission?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-commission" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="commission" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">No. It’s part of our pledge to be honest and transparent about what you’re buying. Saatva is committed to giving you honest guidance, even if it means directing you to another mattress brand that’s a better fit for you. In a regular mattress store environment, a commissioned employee makes more money when they sell you a particular brand, so you may get pressured into a choice that’s not right for you. That’s just not the Saatva way.</p></div></div></div></li><li><div class="accordion-module__item-83a accordion-module__item--bgContrast1-508 accordion-set-module__hidden-3f8 u-marginBottom--md specsFaqsAccordion__item" data-testid="accordion"><h3><button role="button" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-module__titleContainer-b97" id="accordion-title-advantages-made-in-usa-mattress" aria-controls="accordion-content-advantages-made-in-usa-mattress"><div class="accordion-module__titleInnerContainer-84a"><span class="specsFaqsAccordion__title">What are the advantages of mattresses that are made in America?</span><span></span></div><span class="accordion-module__icon-d63" aria-hidden="true"><svg name="more" class="icon-module__more-21e accordion__icon" role="img" alt="more" description="Expand/Collapse" viewBox="0 0 13 13" width="13" height="13" aria-labelledby="accordionIcon"><title id="accordionIcon">Expand/Collapse</title><path d="M6.5,1v11"></path><path d="M1,6.5h11"></path></svg></span></button></h3><div class="accordion-module__content-22f" data-testid="region" id="accordion-content-advantages-made-in-usa-mattress" style="max-height: 0px;"><div class="accordion-module__contentContainer-104"><p id="advantages-made-in-usa-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Mattresses made in the U.S.A. must meet strict health, safety, and environmental standards. The U.S. and the E.U. have the toughest regulations, but other countries may not offer the same protections.</p><p id="advantages-made-in-usa-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Knowing where your mattress is made makes it easier to ensure that the manufacturer adheres to guidelines that protect workers from danger and exploitation, such as labor regulations and minimum-wage laws. Reputable mattresses manufacturers (like our network of 19 independent factories across the U.S.) also work to minimize environmental impact by incorporating low-carbon-footprint processes and recycled materials into their products.</p><p id="advantages-made-in-usa-mattress" class="specsFaqsAccordion__description">Learn more about the benefits of buying an <a href="https://saatva.com/blog/why-you-should-buy-an-american-made-mattress/" target="_blank" class="t-link">American-made mattress</a>.</p></div></div></div></li></ul><button role="button" type="button" aria-label="show more items" aria-controls="accordion-set" aria-expanded="false" class="show-more-button-module__showMoreButton-bf0 show-more-button-module__showMoreButton--round-8c6"><span class="show-more-button-module__showMoreButton__plus-dd2">+</span></button></div></div></section></div></section><section class="section rightSetup u-bgColor--contrastWhite" data-selector="rightsetup"><div class="container"><h2 class="t-heading2-refined u-marginBottom--xs">Find the right bed setup for you</h2><p class="t-bodyLg rightSetup__subtitle u-marginBottom--xs">Comfort starts from the ground up. u-marginBottom--2xs">Foundation vs. box spring: What’s the difference?</div><div class="u-marginBottom--sm"><span>A mattress foundation is a <span class="t-base">new &amp; improved</span> version of the old-fashioned box spring. Foundations use more stable wood support slats, while box springs use bouncier metal coils for support.</span></div><div class="t-heading4 u-marginBottom--2xs">This setup is great for:</div><ul <span class="error-text max_length yotpo-hidden">Max length was exceeded</span>
<span class="error-text mandatory_field yotpo-hidden">Please fill out all of the mandatory (*) fields</span>
<span class="error-text open_question_answer_length yotpo-hidden">One or more of your answers does not meet the required criteria</span>

    <div class="yotpo yotpo-pre-loader">

</div> <form aria-label="Ask A Question Form"> <div class="write-question-wrapper write-form"> <div class="write-review yotpo-regular-box" id="write-question-tabpanel" role="tabpanel">  <div> <h2 class="y-label yotpo-header-title">ASK A QUESTION</h2> </div> <div class="yotpo-mandatory-explain"> <span class="yotpo-mandatory-mark">* </span> Indicates a required field </div> <br> <div class="write-question-content"> <div class="form-group"> <div class="form-element"> <label class="y-label" for="yotpo_input_question_content"><span class="yotpo-mandatory-mark">* </span>Question:     <div class="yotpo-review yotpo-regular-box yotpo-regular-box-filters-padding " data-review-id="507383620" yotpo-content-collapsed="true"> <div class="yotpo-header yotpo-verified-user ">  <span class="yotpo-icon-profile yotpo-header-element pull-left"> <span class="yotpo-user-letter">B</span> <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-circle-checkmark yotpo-action-hover" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="yotpo-tool-tip" data-target-container="yotpo-header"></span> </span>  <div class="yotpo-header-element "> <span class="y-label yotpo-user-name yotpo-font-bold pull-left" aria-level="3">Brandt C.</span>  <div class="label-with-tooltip pull-left" aria-level="3">  <span class="y-label yotpo-user-title yotpo-action-hover" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="yotpo-tool-tip" aria-describedby="507383620" role="heading">Verified Reviewer</span>   </div>  <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> <div class="yotpo-review-stars "> <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="sr-only">5.0 star rating</span>   </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> </div> <div class="yotpo-header-element yotpo-header-actions ">  <span class="y-label yotpo-review-date" aria-label="review date 10/04/23">10/04/23</span>  </div> </div> <div class="yotpo-main ">  <div class="content-title yotpo-font-bold" role="heading" aria-level="3"> Unbelievable quality and service </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> <div class="yotpo-review-wrapper"> <span class="sr-only" id="507383620-ada-summary-text">Review by Brandt C. on  4 Oct 2023</span> <span class="sr-only" id="507383620-ada-title-text">review stating Unbelievable quality and service</span> <div class="content-review" id="507383620"> I am the proud owner of three Saatva Loom &amp; Leaf mattresses (2 Q, 1 TwinXL) and could not be happier with the quality of the mattresses and the quality of sleep my family enjoys on them! Recently after moving mattresses around in our home we noted a “lump” had formed in one queen mattress and it felt like one of the internal layers of foam had<span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="closed" aria-expanded="false" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="507383620-read-more">...Read More</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="507383620-read-more">Read more about  I am the proud owner of three Saatva</span><p class="rest-content-collapsed"> shifted. I was suspicious this would not be covered by warranty but contacted Saatva customer service to see what could be done. I had the pleasure of speaking with Christine who informed me that Saatva’s Friends for Life warranty would absolutely cover any defects in workmanship. I sent her a couple photos and she offered me options to resolve the issue I was having. I chose to return the bed and have it repaired and Christine took care of all the details. The process was simply the best experience I have had with customer service EVER! Thank you Christine! And thank you Saatva for having enough confidence in your incredible products to back them for life and even more for having associates like Christine to represent you. ***** review from this customer (for life!). <span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="opened" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="507383620-read-less">Read Less</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="507383620-read-less">Read less about  I am the proud owner of three Saatva</span></p></div> </div>   <a class="product-link-wrapper " aria-label="Product Loom &amp; Leaf Mattress" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" href="https://yotpo.com/go/9oQBguhT" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"> <div data-product-id="328295206" class="y-label product-link"> On Loom &amp; Leaf Mattress </div> </a> </div> <div class="yotpo-footer "> <div class="footer-actions">    <span class="yotpo-action" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="share-review" aria-labelledby="review-507383620" rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="sr-only">5.0 star rating</span>   </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> </div> <div class="yotpo-header-element yotpo-header-actions ">  <span class="y-label yotpo-review-date" aria-label="review date 09/20/23">09/20/23</span>  </div> </div> <div class="yotpo-main ">  <div class="content-title yotpo-font-bold" role="heading" aria-level="3"> Buying Experience </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> <div class="yotpo-review-wrapper"> <span class="sr-only" id="502377575-ada-summary-text">Review by Julie D. on 20 Sep 2023</span> <span class="sr-only" id="502377575-ada-title-text">review stating Buying Experience</span> <div class="content-review" id="502377575"> I start out talking with William on the phone. He couldn’t have been more professional. William answered all my questions and was well inform about the Saatva products. I asked about several models and their pricing and he provide all information about pricing, returns, and the trial period. However, my husband wanted to test the mattress out in p<span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="closed" aria-expanded="false" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="502377575-read-more">...Read More</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="502377575-read-more">Read more about  I start out talking with William on</span><p class="rest-content-collapsed">erson so William provided us with an address in Philadelphia, PA. Because of the reputation of the mattress we drove 1 hour and 51 minutes to visit the store (and we love Philadelphia). We were greeted by Joseph at the store who took us to the split king mattress and fully explained all the features of the base and the mattress. Joseph was well informed. After trying the split king with the luxury foam too he offered to show us the classic and my husband and I both said no; we were extremely impressed with that mattress. There was absolutely no pressure to purchase the higher end mattress nor any mattress at all. We did however purchase the split king. The quality of the mattress and the very generous trail period, the life time warranty against defects, the 1 year trail period, and Joseph’s professionalism sold this mattress. My husband told me at the time to get all the necessary bedding but I declined. However, the next day I called Saatva and ordered the organic mattress pad, 2 sets of organic sateen sheets, extra pillow cases and the year round weight comforter over the home and the lady on the phone was also pleasant to deal with and very professional and helpful. My all around opinion is the Saatva company really does care about your buying experience and the people on their team couldn’t be more pleasant and helpful to work with. Our whole experience was wonderful. Buying from Saatva is worth the investment. Now my friend is going to the Saatva store to buy her new mattress. Highly, highly recommended. <span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="opened" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="502377575-read-less">Read Less</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="502377575-read-less">Read less about  I start out talking with William on</span></p></div> </div>   <a class="product-link-wrapper " aria-label="Product Loom &amp; Leaf Mattress" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" href="https://yotpo.com/go/9oQBguhT" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"> <div data-product-id="328295206" class="y-label product-link"> On Loom &amp; Leaf Mattress </div> </a> </div> <div class="yotpo-footer "> <div class="footer-actions">    <span class="yotpo-action" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="share-review" yotpo-regular-box  " data-review-id="501762835" yotpo-content-collapsed="true"> <div class="yotpo-header yotpo-verified-user ">  <span class="yotpo-icon-profile yotpo-header-element pull-left"> <span class="yotpo-user-letter">L</span> <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-circle-checkmark yotpo-action-hover" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="yotpo-tool-tip" class="label-with-tooltip pull-left" aria-level="3">  <span class="y-label yotpo-user-title yotpo-action-hover" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="yotpo-tool-tip" aria-describedby="501762835" role="heading">Verified Reviewer</span>   </div>  <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> <div class="yotpo-review-stars "> <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star pull-left"></span><span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-star rating-star class="yotpo-header-element yotpo-header-actions ">  <span class="y-label yotpo-review-date" aria-label="review date 09/18/23">09/18/23</span>  </div> </div> <div class="yotpo-main ">  <div class="content-title yotpo-font-bold" role="heading" aria-level="3"> Delivery of Saatva Mattress </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> <div class="yotpo-review-wrapper"> <span class="sr-only" id="501762835-ada-summary-text">Review by Linda on 18 Sep 2023</span> <span class="sr-only" id="501762835-ada-title-text">review stating Delivery of Saatva Mattress</span> <div class="content-review" id="501762835"> After purchasing another brand of mattress and sleeping on it for 50 nights, I knew it was not working for me. <br> I read the reviews on this site and decided to call the 800 number for Saatva and ask a lot of questions. The young lady that answered my call was extremely helpful, answered all of my many questions and made a suggestion of the Loom<span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="closed" aria-expanded="false" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="501762835-read-more">...Read More</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="501762835-read-more">Read more about  After purchasing another brand of</span><p class="rest-content-collapsed"> &amp; Leaf mattress based on what I told her I needed and was looking for. No sales pitch, no pressure, just information! I decided to order the mattress that same day! I was contacted less than a week later with a delivery date. I received a confirmation the day before delivery. The day of delivery I received a call from the delivery driver telling me he was 20 minutes away! Sure enough. they arrived 20 minutes later, both of them very friendly and pleasant, confirming where the mattress was to go. I needed the other mattress moved to another location (I had notified the other company 3 weeks prior to come pick up the mattress and I still have not heard a word from them)! The 2 delivery men said no problem they would move it for me. They brought the new Loom &amp; Leaf mattress up the steps, took the wrapper off and put it in place. They removed the wrapper and said they were sure that I would love my mattress and very politely thanked me. They were extremely pleasant gentlemen! I haven't slept on the mattress enough to give a solid review but will do that in a couple of months. <span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="opened" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="501762835-read-less">Read Less</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="501762835-read-less">Read less about  After purchasing another brand of</span></p></div> &amp;amp; Leaf Mattress - Our firm ultra-premium memory foam mattress</span> <div class="content-review" id="499868738"> This mattress is, by far, the most comfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on. I’m using it now for almost six months, kept its shape and firmness too. Customer service was excellent Mike answered all my questions and provided information I didn't even think of. <div class="yotpo-review-wrapper"> <span class="sr-only" id="498880933-ada-summary-text">Review by Linda C. on  7 Sep 2023</span> <span class="sr-only" id="498880933-ada-title-text">review stating Initial Phone call</span> <div class="content-review" id="498880933"> I called as I had many questions in my search for the right mattress. The call was answered promptly and the young lady answered all my questions, provided ample information, went above and beyond providing information I didn't even know I needed (but I did), no sales pressure at all! She said if I had any additional questions to call 24/7!!! Wow!<span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="closed" aria-expanded="false" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="498880933-read-more">...Read More</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="498880933-read-more">Read more about  I called as I had many questions in my</span><p class="rest-content-collapsed"> I ordered the mattress she suggested based on all my questions and her information that night! I am so excited and anxiously awaiting to receive my mattress and fingers are crossed that I will LOVE it! <span class="yotpo-read-more" data-position="opened" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="498880933-read-less">Read Less</span><span class="sr-only" aria-hidden="true" id="498880933-read-less">Read less about  I called as I had many questions in my</span></p></div> </div>   <a class="product-link-wrapper " aria-label="Product Loom &amp; Leaf Mattress" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" href="https://yotpo.com/go/9oQBguhT" target="_blank" </span>  </div> <div class="yotpo-clr"></div> </div>   <div class="no-border yotpo-comments-box visible">   <div class="yotpo-comment-box yotpo-comment " data-answer-id="26872884"> <div class="yotpo-header yotpo-store-owner "> <span class="yotpo-icon-profile yotpo-header-element pull-left ">  <span class="yotpo-user-letter">  <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-store"></span>  </span>  <span class="yotpo-icon yotpo-icon-circle-checkmark yotpo-action-hover" data-type="toggleFade" data-target="yotpo-tool-tip-answer"></span> </span> <div class="yotpo-header-element"> <span class="y-label yotpo-user-name yotpo-font-bold pull-left">Saatva</span>  </div> <div class="yotpo-header-element yotpo-header-actions"> <span class="y-label question-date" aria-label="answer date 01/14/23">01/14/23</span> </div> </div> <div class="yotpo-main"> <div class="content-title yotpo-font-bold"> </div> <div class="content-question"> A:  All mattresses are handcrafted and made to order, and delivery generally takes between 9 and 21 days from the day the order is placed. <br> <br>Once your mattress has been manufactured and is ready to be delivered, our delivery team that is local to your area will contact you directly to coordinate your delivery date. You will be able to pick a date that best works for you.  </div> </div> <div class="yotpo-footer"> <div class="footer-actions"> </div> <div class="yotpo-helpful" role="group"> <span class="y-label
